page.title: 05Local Childrens Games.
page.content: { {Hide and Seek. { { {You }need a base and a person who is called a seeker.The seeker counts up to an agreed number while the other players hide. The seeker must not look where the other players are hiding while he or she is counting.He or she must not start looking for the other players until he has finished counting up to the agreed number.If he finds someone and gets back to the base before they can,then the person who has been caught is out.But if they get back to the base without being caught then he is not out.The first person who gets caught is out for the next game.
